definition: of or belonging to a racial group having light skin coloration, (usually in the plural) trousers made of flannel or gabardine or tweed or white cloth, turn white
details:
adjective
- of or belonging to a racial group having light skin coloration
= example: of or belonging to a racial group having light skin coloration
- of summer nights in northern latitudes where the sun barely sets
= example: of summer nights in northern latitudes where the sun barely sets
- being of the achromatic color of maximum lightness
- anemic looking from illness or emotion
= synonyms: bloodless
- (of hair) having lost its color
= example: (of hair) having lost its color
= synonyms: whitened
- (of coffee) having cream or milk added
- (of a surface) not written or printed on
= synonyms: blank, clean
- benevolent
- glowing white with heat
= example: glowing white with heat
= synonyms: white-hot
- restricted to whites only
= example: restricted to whites only
= synonyms: lily-white
- marked by the presence of snow
= example: marked by the presence of snow
= synonyms: snowy
- free from moral blemish or impurity
noun
- (usually in the plural) trousers made of flannel or gabardine or tweed or white cloth
= synonyms: gabardine
- (board games) the lighter pieces
- the quality or state of the achromatic color of greatest lightness (bearing the least resemblance to black)
= synonyms: whiteness
- the white part of an egg
= synonyms: egg white, albumen, ovalbumin
verb
- turn white
= example: turn white
= synonyms: whiten
